attributes.action: Tell our Police to work with Paedophile hunting groups & not against them
attributes.background:
Paedophile hunting groups have proven how effective they can be. They are all volunteers and their skills should be utilsed. 

What can be more important than protecting our children against predators!
Encourage all of your depts to work with and train the groups.
Help them, Do Not deter them!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
